channel.title: Tor Exit / Relay Configuration
channel.description:
Hello,
i was wondering about the Tor Configuration of the Whonix GW (got the VirtualBox for Windows Installer here for testing) and could not find the proper information on the Wiki or in the config files.
Just to be sure - the TOR ExitPolicy is current set to "none" and the ExitRelay is set to "auto" (as i can see in nyx) - should this not be set to "reject *" and "0" so my machine is not acting as an Exit Gateway?
Any help is highly appreciated!

item.title: Tor Exit / Relay Configuration
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
GW is configured as simple client by default.

Read full topic

item.title: Tor Exit / Relay Configuration

item.description:
Thanks for the quick reply!

Interesting information but i was wondering what the current configuration within the Whonix Gateway is - is it configured as a simple node, relay or exit gw?

item.title: Tor Exit / Relay Configuration
item.dc:creator: Mumpitz
item.description:
Hello,

i was wondering about the Tor Configuration of the Whonix GW (got the VirtualBox for Windows Installer here for testing) and could not find the proper information on the Wiki or in the config files.

Just to be sure - the TOR ExitPolicy is current set to “none” and the ExitRelay is set to “auto” (as i can see in nyx) - should this not be set to “reject *” and “0” so my machine is not acting as an Exit Gateway?

Any help is highly appreciated!

Read full topic
